Articles.Content: Been playing for over a year now. Love this game! ![:cool:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cool.gif)![Planetoryglory.jpg](http://www./view/u7qsokcr371cb6m/Planetoryglory.jpg)[http://www./view/u7qsokcr371cb6m/Planetoryglory.jpg](http://www./view/u7qsokcr371cb6m/Planetoryglory.jpg)

Hello, and welcome to the forum. ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

I'm afraid I do not know how to get pics from Mediafire to display on the forum, but Imgur.com is both free, and pretty simple to use. Just copy the BBCode link they provide straight into your forum posts, and you shouldn't have any trouble.

Greetings!

You can also use postimage.org without registration. The vehicles you have there are pretty neat, though. Are the SSTO's?
